sentences.en: Acts 23:4 And those standing by said, Do you revile the high priest of God?
sentences.cn: 徒二三4站在旁边的人说, 你辱骂神的大祭司 么 ?

sentences.en: And those standing by said, Do you revile the high priest of God?
sentences.cn: 4站在旁边的人说, 你辱骂神的大祭司 么 ?

sentences.en: Blessed are you when people revile you and persecute you and utteryou falselyw on my account.
sentences.cn: 人若因我辱骂你们,逼迫你们,捏造各样坏话诽谤你们,你们就有福了.

sentences.en: How long will the enemy mock you, O God? Will the foe revile your name forever?
sentences.cn: 10神阿,敌人辱骂要到几时呢? 仇敌亵渎你的名,要到永远 吗 ?

sentences.en: Lk. 6:28 Bless those who curse you ; pray for those revile you.
sentences.cn: 路六28要为那咒诅你们的祝福, 为那淩辱你们的祷告.

sentences.en: Lk. 6:28 Bless those who curse you ; pray for those who revile you.
sentences.cn: 路六28要为那咒诅你们的祝福, 为那凌辱你们的祷告.

sentences.en: Nevertheless in like manner these dreamers also defile the flesh and despise lordship and revile dignities.
sentences.cn: 8然而,这些作梦的人,还是照样玷污肉体,轻慢主治者,毁谤在尊位的.

sentences.en: No man should reproach, revile, or slander another man.
sentences.cn: 人们不应羞辱, 辱骂, 或诽谤他人.

sentences.en: The attendants said, " Would you revile God's high priest? "
sentences.cn: 旁边站着的人说: " 你竟敢辱骂天主的大司祭 吗 ?

sentences.en: The President was now reviled by the same party he had helped to lead.
sentences.cn: 如今谩骂总统的正是他曾经协助领导的那个政党。

sentences.en: Use no reproachful language against any one; neither curse nor revile.
sentences.cn: 不要对任何人出言不逊, 切忌诅咒、辱骂他人.

sentences.en: What right had the crowd to revile the England players for something they could not help...?
sentences.cn: 观众有什么权力因为英格兰队员们无能为力的事情而斥责他们？

trans.tran_en: to express hatred of someone or something
